MAN.TITLE: besseli
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Modified Bessel functions of the first kind (I sub alpha).

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : real vector with non negative entries
: real vector with non negative entries regularly spaced with increment equal to one alpha=alpha0+(n1:n2)

DESCRIPTION.P: besseli(alpha,x) computes modified Bessel functions of the first kind (I sub alpha), for real, non-negative order alpha and argument x. alpha and x may be vectors. The output is m-by-n with m = size(x,'*'), n = size(alpha,'*') whose (i,j) entry is besseli(alpha(j),x(i)).
I_alpha and K_alpha (see besselk) modified Bessel functions are 2 independant solutions of the modified Bessel 's differential equation :
DESCRIPTION.VERBATIM: 2 2 2 x y" + x y' - (x + alpha ) y = 0 , alpha >= 0
DESCRIPTION.P: If ice is equal to 2 exponentialy scaled Bessel functions is computed (I_alpha_scaled(x) = exp(-x) I_alpha(x)).
